thread.title: Defense, special teams lift East Burke over Draughn
thread.title_full: Defense, special teams lift East Burke over Draughn

author: STAFF REPORTS
title: Defense, special teams lift East Burke over Draughn
text:
Defense, special teams lift East Burke over Draughn Freedom, Patton also nab wins in league play Defense, special teams lift East Burke over Draughn STAFF REPORTS The News Herald ICARD — The East Burke football team had hung its hat all year on an offense which was churning out 352 yards and 33 points on average. But Friday at Danny Williams Field on homecoming night versus its biggest rival, the Cavaliers’ defense and special teams took center stage in a 33-14 win over Draughn.
